channel.title: Crossbow problem
channel.description:
Hello all...
I have added Armadyl cbow to my server i am using PI 317 after i added cbow and added it to combatassistant it start fire dragon bolts but it still can fire rune arrows how i can fix this please? someone can help me ? ill be very happy thanks... :palm:

item.title: Crossbow problem
item.dc:creator: @Cesko_Bro Cesko Bro
item.description:
@Cesko_Bro wrote:

Yea chaotic but where i can find those codes? at combatassist? thanks for helping…

Read full topic

item.title: Crossbow problem
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

If there’s any other type of crossbow in the server try searching for that in your files. There’s probably a “crossbow method” of some kind that will tell it to only fire bolts and not arrows.

Read full topic
